GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.4.226
GSD.description:
iommu/vt-d: Fix PCI device refcount leak in dmar_dev_scope_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.226 by commit cbdd83bd2fd67142b03ce9dbdd1eab322ff7321f, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit 2e45528930388658603ea24d49cf52867b928d3e. For more details please see the references link.
